Uses of Class
com.sun.tools.attach.VirtualMachineDescriptor

  • Packages that use VirtualMachineDescriptor 
    Package Description
    com.sun.tools.attach
    Provides the API to attach to a JavaTM virtual machine.
    com.sun.tools.attach.spi
    Provider classes for the com.sun.tools.attach package.

    • Uses of VirtualMachineDescriptor in com.sun.tools.attach

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<VirtualMachineDescriptor> VirtualMachine.list()
      Return a list of Java virtual machines.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
